protocol.name: P-GSE21762-2
protocol.text: 7-day-old seedlings were treated with 100 uM MeJA or Mock (EtOH) for 4 hr

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown under long-day and 23 C on MS media

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-4
protocol.text: total RNA was extracted by Trizol method and was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated total RNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 100ng total RNA (GeneChip速 Whole Transcript Sense Target Labeling Assay Manual).

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-6
protocol.text: This procedure used GeneChip速 hybridization, wash, and stain kit, three heating blocks are used: one at 65C, one at 99C, and the  third one at 45C

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using The GeneChip速 Scanner 3000 7G, and is controlled by GeneChip速 Operating Software (GCOS).

protocol.name: P-GSE21762-8
protocol.text: By using Expression Console software from Affymetrix performed RMA analysis and got QC report. *.CEL files as input in RMA method and by using Partek GS 6.4 software got RMA Data. Then ANOVA analysis was performed based on RMA Data.
